plurals.name: continue_on_desktop_body
plurals.item: If you select “Continue” you will be sending the following order to the desktop Order Express and you will no longer have access from the app
If you select “Continue” you will be sending the following orders to the desktop Order Express and you will no longer have access from the app

plurals.name: cancel_and_keep_orders
plurals.item: Cancel and keep order on the app
Cancel and keep orders on the app

plurals.name: all_orders_sent_on_desktop_msg
plurals.item: Order has been sent to desktop.
All orders have been sent to desktop.

plurals.name: place_orders_body
plurals.item: Your order will go into processing immediately.
Your orders will go into processing immediately.

plurals.name: review_my_orders
plurals.item: Go Back and Review My Order
Go Back and Review My Orders

plurals.name: orders_downloaded_title
plurals.item: Your order has been copied to your mobile cart
Your orders have been copied to your mobile cart

plurals.name: orders_continue_working
plurals.item: You can now continue working on your order.
You can now continue working on your orders.
